sys_script.name: Splitting property address

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_6eb05b968319521008b7c596feaad370
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1542827_proper_0_property_address</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Splitting property address </name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var preferredAddress = current.address;
var splitedAddress = preferredAddress.split(",");

            current.street = splitedAddress[0].trim(); 
            current.city = splitedAddress[1].trim(); 
            current.country_code = splitedAddress[2].trim();
            current.post_code = splitedAddress[3].trim(); 

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-19 19:09:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6eb05b968319521008b7c596feaad370</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Splitting property address </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Property Management Ltd" source="x_1542827_proper_0">9caa27a983d1121008b7c596feaad301</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Property Management Ltd">9caa27a983d1121008b7c596feaad301</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6eb05b968319521008b7c596feaad370</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-19 20:15:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6eb05b968319521008b7c596feaad370"/></record_update>
